casebody.data:
No. 187,

Misc.

McIlvaine et al. v. Louisiana. Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted. Maurice R. Woulje for petitioners. Jack P. F. Gremillion, Attorney General of Louisiana, William P. Schuler, Assistant Attorney General, and Jim Garrison for respondent.

Sup. Ct. La. Certiorari denied.
